Banner.Description: I have 8 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I focus on writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and Laravel, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 8 years of experience I've covered many roles: System Analyst, backend developer, frontend developer, and technical leader. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing improvements in systems, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether as a hobby or for utility.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Technical decision leader
Technical talent recruitment for the company
Department of Technology team leader
Creation and maintenance of an internal process management platform for sales courses
Programming of custom functions and plugins for customization of a WordPress platform
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Planning meetings with reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Creation and maintenance of a monitoring platform with graphics in WordPress.
Functional programming in templates and plugins to add the necessary monitoring features.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Creation and maintenance of a second Monitoring Platform Done in Angular, Angular Material, Laravel, Mysql, RxJS, Sass with graphics (configurable), alarm system, and user management and configuration of general parameters.
Planning meetings in reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Creating platforms with Angular, Laravel, ExpressJS, WordPress programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Automation of processes with data structures.
Design layout with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, Bulma, etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: FullStack developer
Description: Leading a team of 4 people in the development of a Tourism Data management platform made in Angular, Laravel, and MySQL.
Implementation CI / CD in Azure. Refactoring and optimizing application load times.
Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Writing weekly reports about goals and plans.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer
Description: Creation of WordPress templates with ACF, functional programming in Javascript / jQuery, styles in SASS
integration of design improvements, and template loading times.
Effective communication with the design team, working with Avocode / Figma.

Experience.Jobs.Title: System analyst
Description: Programming of new functionalities for an existing employee management platform made in Angular and ExpressJS.
Perform refactoring of old code. Ensuring compatibility of every dependency in every update, along with regular Angular update as well.

Experience.Jobs.Title: English teacher
Description: Teaching English at a basic level to an enrollment of more than 200 students.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Gisselle
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web application for internal company management that covers sales, billing, and extensive and complex tracking departments, made with Angular and Laravel. It works with websockets, schedules, Laravel jobs, integrations with WordPress, Zadarma, LiveConnect, etc.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Emelteciot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application for data consultation, made with Angular and Laravel. It applies the chart.js graphics library

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application built from scratch with auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has reactive form logic for configuring parameters.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu super plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plan quote that has a search engine with which advanced queries are made. Plans are displayed based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has online chatcontact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform belonging to water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hands game
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Countries viewer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An interface that consumes an API of countries with which you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
